title: Life expectancy in Mexico 2017
yAxis: Life expectancy at birth in years
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Life expectancy at birth in years, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general Life expectancy at birth in years has stayed the same over the Year.
Life expectancy at birth in years is gradually decreasing from 2007 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2016, and finally roughly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2007 and 2008.
Maximum Life expectancy at birth in years, about 75.26 was reported at Year 2007
Minimum Life expectancy at birth in years about 74.9 was reached at Year 2015

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Life expectancy at birth in years. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall Life expectancy at birth in years has decreased over the Year.
Life expectancy at birth in years is gradually decreasing from 2007 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2016, and finally roughly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2007 and 2008.
Maximum Life expectancy at birth in years, about 75.26 was reported at Year 2007
Minimum Life expectancy at birth in years about 74.9 was reached at Year 2015
